effect_entries.effect: This Pokémon inflicts twice as much damage with moves whose types match its own, rather than the usual same-type attack bonus of 1.5×.
effect_entries.short_effect: Increases the same-type attack bonus from 1.5× to 2×.

effect_entries.effect:
This Pokémon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning the target with each hit.

This counts as an extra effect for the purposes of shield dust.  This ability takes effect before mummy.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning target Pokémon upon contact.

effect_entries.effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being poisoned.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning attacking Pokémon on contact.
